scrape.title: The dinner
scrape.author: Kimberly
scrape.text: This book was like listening to an insufferable person talking who you can't get away from. All you want them to is shut up. The narrator is trying to convince you to hate his brother, meanwhile he is the one you really can't stand. I was really hoping the end would reveal that the narrator was talking to a doctor in a psychiatric ward the entire novel. A better title to this book would have been: Psycho-The Holland edition.
